org.jfree.chart.labels
Interface XYZToolTipGenerator

All Superinterfaces:
XYToolTipGenerator
All Known Implementing Classes:
StandardXYZToolTipGenerator
public interface XYZToolTipGenerator
extends XYToolTipGenerator

Interface for a tooltip generator for plots that use data from an XYZDataset.

Method Summary

          Generates a tool tip text item for a particular item within a series.

Method Detail

generateToolTip

java.lang.String generateToolTip(XYZDataset dataset,
                                 int series,
                                 int item)
Generates a tool tip text item for a particular item within a series.

Parameters:
dataset - the dataset (null not permitted).
series - the series index (zero-based).
item - the item index (zero-based).
Returns:
The tooltip text (possibly null).
